content.en: Railway optimization: Researchers are using a simulated annealing algorithm to optimize various aspects of railway operations. This algorithm is being used to improve the assignment of train sets, track allocation, energy consumption, train rescheduling, train design, coordination of train timetables, line planning, traffic routing, train scheduling, ticket pricing strategy, and more. By applying this algorithm, researchers aim to enhance the efficiency and effectiveness of railway systems.
content.da: Jernbaneoptimering: Forskere bruger en simuleret hærdningsalgoritme til at optimere forskellige aspekter af jernbanedrift. Denne algoritme bruges til at forbedre tildelingen af togsæt, sporfordeling, energiforbrug, omlægning af tog, togsdesign, koordinering af togtidsplaner, linjeplanlægning, trafikruting, togplanlægning, billetprisstrategi og mere. Ved at anvende denne algoritme sigter forskerne mod at forbedre effektiviteten og virkningsgraden af jernbanesystemer.
